name: Shoot Zombies All
description:
this is nice of shoot to kill zombies game style
You hate zombies
You want shoot to kill all zombies
Come to shoot and kill zombies all
zombies appears every where
Controlling your hero man shoot to kill zombies all
You can choose rifle gun, short gun to shoot zombies or throw grenade to kill many zombies
You like sniper, shoot, kill zombies games
this shoot all zombies game is very nice
and this shoot all zombies game is all free
just play this shoot all zombies game
Take funny guys.

Feature
- short gun unlimited bullets shoot to kill zombies
- rifle gun give you limited bullets with one shoot you can kill zombies
- grenades throwing to kill all zombies around
